title: How do I add and remove an alarm?
answer:
1. Touch Clock. 

 2. Access the alarm screen. 

 3. Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112882). Then perform the following: 

 − Set the time when the alarm will go off, as shown in the following figure. 

 − To set the alarm to repeat on certain days, select the desired intervals under Repeat. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112883)

 − To set a ringtone for the alarm, touch Ringtone and select the desired ringtone. 

 − To set your phone to vibrate when the alarm goes off, turn on Vibrate. 

 − To name the alarm, enter a name in Label. 

 4. Touch Done. 

 On the alarm screen, you can find the list of all alarms. Use the slider to turn on or off an alarm. To delete an alarm, touch and hold it and select Delete alarm from the displayed option menu.
